bento.title: Save as image
bento.content: Save you schedule as an image and share it on twitter.

bento.title: Custom design and branding
bento.content: Customize your schedule to suit your style, lore and audience. Make it your own with custom backgrounds, colors, fonts and more.

bento.title: Twitch connected
bento.content: Schedule is connected to your twitch account, as you update your twitch schedule, the schedule will be updated here.

bento.title: Boost Productivity
bento.content: No more messing around with bulky photo editing tools. Quickly create a schedule with a couple of clicks, and then export it as an image for sharing on social media.
